fullText: Chita Rivera, now 82, remains a force of nature who can command a stage with a look, a gesture or a note. In 'The Visit,' she gets to do all three as Claire Zachanassian, a vengeful billionaire who returns to her economically depressed hometown with a shocking proposition.
